Alt Title: 婆羅門子命終愛念不離經
佛為黃竹園老婆羅門說學經
請觀世音菩薩消伏毒害陀羅尼呪經

CSZJJ: 優陀夷坐樹下寂靜調伏經
比丘問佛何故捨世學道經
波斯匿王承佛神力到寶坊經
長者威施所問菩薩修行經
長者詣佛說子婦不恭經
Notes: Correct but seems to have got the information elsewhere than the Kaiyuan Lu

CSZJJ: 長者詣佛說子婦不恭經
Notes: Correct but seems to have got the information elsewhere than the Kaiyuan Lu

Alt Title: 佛說大金色孔雀王呪經

Notes: Close synonym but not based on the Kaiyuan Lu

Alt Title: 虛空藏菩薩問七佛陀羅尼呪經
Notes: The alt title comes from Fascicle 1 of Summary Catalog of Esoteric Mantras from Numerous Teachers 諸阿闍梨真言密教部類總錄 (T 2176)
Jus by virtue of being very similar
Fascicle 2 of the Kaiyuan Lu says that this is an extract
